name: Escape from Power City
description:
You are a person named Jerffel Bipple. The Power City's mayor has hired you to save the place, but you failed and now everyones gotta get out and your stuck where you were when you messed everything up. It's going really bad for you.

CONTROLS:

turn              left / right
forward           up
breaks            down
shoot             Z
charge lasers     L
charge breaks     B
synthesize fuel   F

toggle fullscreen   F11
